Quick RecipesÂ¶

Here are some ready-made recipes for you to get familiar with HorizonGRound.

  • Forward Modelling from Tracer Luminosity Function
    • Visualise the luminosity function surface
    • Customise your own luminosity function
  • Likelihood Fitting of Tracer Luminosity Function
    • Load luminosity function measurements
    • Evaluate luminosity function likelihood
  • Modified Power Spectrum Multipoles

The data used in these tutorials are packaged with the released distribution and can be accessed with the help of the get_test_data_loc() function. Alternatively, test data sets can be downloaded from here. Note that these data sets are mostly taken from Palanque-Delabrouille et al. (2016) 1.

1

Palanque-Delabrouille N. et al., 2016. A&A 587, A41. [arXiv: 1509.05607]
